thread.section_title: Toolauthority Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Toolauthority | www.toolauthority.com
thread.title: Randv.

author: Randv.
title: Randv.
text: I love the levels!!! They are sturdy and the best on the market. This review would have received 5 stars (I almost rated this a 3) if the packaging would have been better. For such an important instrument as these levels I would expect better packaging for shipping. The levels just had a single layer of cardboard protecting them and that cardboard was punctured in one place and bent in another and partially opened. I checked the levels and they seem to have arrived safely despite the poor packaging.
